author: stsp
msg: (receive_from_gpg_agent): Clear the response buffer before attemping
to read a response from the agent. Prevents this function from
returning a stale response it obtained during a previous invocation
in case the gpg agent doesn't respond or sends an empty reponse.

author: gjm
msg: theme: specifies the number of columns in a row for ticket fields in ticket view - fixes #129 (from olemis)

author: andy
msg: Handle out-of-range derived integers and very, very large integers (>63 bits).

author: olamy
msg: do not add directories already added !
